name: System Shutdown (KWE Game Design)
description:
Title: SYSTEM SHUTDOWN!

Name of Game Platform: PC

Genre: 3D Action Sci-Fi

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 10+

 Game Overview: The world is taken over by an Artificial Intelligence in the year 2065. You are trapped in captivity! You, the player, need to find. way out and try to shut the system down!

 Instructions: Look with the mouse. Press the Left mouse key to shoot. Move your character with the WASD keys. To go through inventory use 1,2,3. Press E to interact. Press left CTRL to crouch. Press the space bar to jump.

Game Design Team: Kameron Eaton and Steve Salah
